title: Complementary Color Schemes

metadata.description: Learn about Complementary Color Schemes with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Complementary schemes are created by combining colors from opposite sides of the color wheel.
Complementary color schemes mostly consist of two complementary colors expanded with grey tones, tints, and shades.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers Complementary Color Schemes concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Complementary Color Schemes effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Complementary Color Schemes and how to apply it in your projects.
